tool_description: Detect domains that are parked using one of the several cash parking domain providers.
name: Cash Parked Domain Detector
title: Cash Parked Domain Detector

api_list.name: Cash Parked Domain Inspector
api_list.description: Gets whether a domain is a known cash parking domain and returns any known information if the domain is found to be cash parking.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cash-parked-domain-detector.p.rapidapi.com/rapidapi/v1/IsCashParkingDomain/gmail.com"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cash-parked-domain-detector.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://cash-parked-domain-detector.p.rapidapi.com/rapidapi/v1/IsCashParkingDomain/{query}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cash-parked-domain-detector.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
